executable.title: Enhance Image Using Discriminant Analysis (TubeTK)
executable.description: Given multiple, registered images and foreground and background masks, computes a LDA (nClasses-1) + PCA space for separating the classes, and generates the LDA and PCA instances of the images.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.
